00046 static char *ip2nets = "";
00047 module_param(ip2nets, charp, 0444);

00066 lnet_get_routes(void)

00071 static char *
00072 lnet_get_networks(void)
00073 {
00074         char   *nets;
00075         int     rc;
00076 
00077         if (*networks != 0 && *ip2nets != 0) {
00078                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x101, "Please specify EITHER 'networks' or "
00079                                    "'ip2nets' but not both at once\n");
00080                 return NULL;
00081         }
00082 
00083         if (*ip2nets != 0) {
00084                 rc = lnet_parse_ip2nets(&nets, ip2nets);
00085                 return (rc == 0) ? nets : NULL;
00086         }
00087 
00088         if (*networks != 0)
00089                 return networks;
00090 
00091         return "tcp";
00092 }

00094 static void
00095 lnet_init_locks(void)
00096 {
00097         spin_lock_init(&the_lnet.ln_eq_wait_lock);
00098         init_waitqueue_head(&the_lnet.ln_eq_waitq);
00099         init_waitqueue_head(&the_lnet.ln_rc_waitq);
00100         mutex_init(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
00101         mutex_init(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
00102 }
00103 
00104 static void
00105 lnet_fini_locks(void)
00106 {
00107 }

00109 static int
00110 lnet_create_remote_nets_table(void)
00111 {
00112         int               i;
00113         struct list_head *hash;
00114 
00115         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash == NULL);
00116         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hbits > 0);
00117         LIBCFS_ALLOC(hash, LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE * sizeof(*hash));
00118         if (hash == NULL) {
00119                 CERROR("Failed to create remote nets hash table\n");
00120                 return -ENOMEM;
00121         }
00122 
00123         for (i = 0; i < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE; i++)
00124                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&hash[i]);
00125         the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash = hash;
00126         return 0;
00127 }
00128 
00129 static void
00130 lnet_destroy_remote_nets_table(void)
00131 {
00132         int i;
00133 
00134         if (the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash == NULL)
00135                 return;
00136 
00137         for (i = 0; i < LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE; i++)
00138                 LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[i]));
00139 
00140         LIBCFS_FREE(the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash,
00141                     LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_SIZE *
00142                     sizeof(the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash[0]));
00143         the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hash = NULL;
00144 }
00145 
00146 static void
00147 lnet_destroy_locks(void)
00148 {
00149         if (the_lnet.ln_res_lock != NULL) {
00150                 cfs_percpt_lock_free(the_lnet.ln_res_lock);
00151                 the_lnet.ln_res_lock = NULL;
00152         }
00153 
00154         if (the_lnet.ln_net_lock != NULL) {
00155                 cfs_percpt_lock_free(the_lnet.ln_net_lock);
00156                 the_lnet.ln_net_lock = NULL;
00157         }
00158 
00159         lnet_fini_locks();
00160 }
00161 
00162 static int
00163 lnet_create_locks(void)
00164 {
00165         lnet_init_locks();
00166 
00167         the_lnet.ln_res_lock = cfs_percpt_lock_alloc(lnet_cpt_table());
00168         if (the_lnet.ln_res_lock == NULL)
00169                 goto failed;
00170 
00171         the_lnet.ln_net_lock = cfs_percpt_lock_alloc(lnet_cpt_table());
00172         if (the_lnet.ln_net_lock == NULL)
00173                 goto failed;
00174 
00175         return 0;
00176 
00177  failed:
00178         lnet_destroy_locks();
00179         return -ENOMEM;
00180 }

00182 static void lnet_assert_wire_constants(void)
00183 {
00184         /* Wire protocol assertions generated by 'wirecheck'
00185          * running on Linux robert.bartonsoftware.com 2.6.8-1.521
00186          * #1 Mon Aug 16 09:01:18 EDT 2004 i686 athlon i386 GNU/Linux
00187          * with gcc version 3.3.3 20040412 (Red Hat Linux 3.3.3-7) */
00188 
00189         /* Constants... */
00190         CLASSERT (LNET_PROTO_TCP_MAGIC == 0xeebc0ded);
00191         CLASSERT (LNET_PROTO_TCP_VERSION_MAJOR == 1);
00192         CLASSERT (LNET_PROTO_TCP_VERSION_MINOR == 0);
00193         CLASSERT (LNET_MSG_ACK == 0);
00194         CLASSERT (LNET_MSG_PUT == 1);
00195         CLASSERT (LNET_MSG_GET == 2);
00196         CLASSERT (LNET_MSG_REPLY == 3);
00197         CLASSERT (LNET_MSG_HELLO == 4);
00198 
00199         /* Checks for struct ptl_handle_wire_t */
00200         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(lnet_handle_wire_t) == 16);
00201         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_handle_wire_t, wh_interface_cookie) == 0);
00202         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_handle_wire_t *)0)->wh_interface_cookie) == 8);
00203         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_handle_wire_t, wh_object_cookie) == 8);
00204         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_handle_wire_t *)0)->wh_object_cookie) == 8);
00205 
00206         /* Checks for struct lnet_magicversion_t */
00207         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(lnet_magicversion_t) == 8);
00208         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_magicversion_t, magic) == 0);
00209         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_magicversion_t *)0)->magic) == 4);
00210         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_magicversion_t, version_major) == 4);
00211         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_magicversion_t *)0)->version_major) == 2);
00212         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_magicversion_t, version_minor) == 6);
00213         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_magicversion_t *)0)->version_minor) == 2);
00214 
00215         /* Checks for struct lnet_hdr_t */
00216         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(lnet_hdr_t) == 72);
00217         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, dest_nid) == 0);
00218         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->dest_nid) == 8);
00219         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, src_nid) == 8);
00220         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->src_nid) == 8);
00221         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, dest_pid) == 16);
00222         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->dest_pid) == 4);
00223         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, src_pid) == 20);
00224         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->src_pid) == 4);
00225         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, type) == 24);
00226         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->type) == 4);
00227         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, payload_length) == 28);
00228         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->payload_length) == 4);
00229         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg) == 32);
00230         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg) == 40);
00231 
00232         /* Ack */
00233         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.dst_wmd) == 32);
00234         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.ack.dst_wmd) == 16);
00235         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.match_bits) == 48);
00236         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.ack.match_bits) == 8);
00237         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.ack.mlength) == 56);
00238         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.ack.mlength) == 4);
00239 
00240         /* Put */
00241         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.ack_wmd) == 32);
00242         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.put.ack_wmd) == 16);
00243         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.match_bits) == 48);
00244         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.put.match_bits) == 8);
00245         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.hdr_data) == 56);
00246         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.put.hdr_data) == 8);
00247         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.ptl_index) == 64);
00248         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.put.ptl_index) == 4);
00249         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.put.offset) == 68);
00250         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.put.offset) == 4);
00251 
00252         /* Get */
00253         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.return_wmd) == 32);
00254         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.get.return_wmd) == 16);
00255         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.match_bits) == 48);
00256         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.get.match_bits) == 8);
00257         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.ptl_index) == 56);
00258         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.get.ptl_index) == 4);
00259         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.src_offset) == 60);
00260         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.get.src_offset) == 4);
00261         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.get.sink_length) == 64);
00262         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.get.sink_length) == 4);
00263 
00264         /* Reply */
00265         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.reply.dst_wmd) == 32);
00266         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.reply.dst_wmd) == 16);
00267 
00268         /* Hello */
00269         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.hello.incarnation) == 32);
00270         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.hello.incarnation) == 8);
00271         CLASSERT ((int)offsetof(lnet_hdr_t, msg.hello.type) == 40);
00272         CLASSERT ((int)sizeof(((lnet_hdr_t *)0)->msg.hello.type) == 4);
00273 }
