00275 static lnd_t *lnet_find_lnd_by_type(__u32 type)
00276 {
00277         lnd_t            *lnd;
00278         struct list_head *tmp;
00279 
00280         /* holding lnd mutex */
00281         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_lnds) {
00282                 lnd = list_entry(tmp, lnd_t, lnd_list);
00283 
00284                 if (lnd->lnd_type == type)
00285                         return lnd;
00286         }
00287         return NULL;
00288 }
00289 
00290 void
00291 lnet_register_lnd (lnd_t *lnd)
00292 {
00293         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
00294 
00295         LASSERT(libcfs_isknown_lnd(lnd->lnd_type));
00296         LASSERT(lnet_find_lnd_by_type(lnd->lnd_type) == NULL);
00297 
00298         list_add_tail(&lnd->lnd_list, &the_lnet.ln_lnds);
00299         lnd->lnd_refcount = 0;
00300 
00301         CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s LND registered\n", libcfs_lnd2str(lnd->lnd_type));
00302 
00303         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
00304 }
00305 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_register_lnd);
00306 
00307 void
00308 lnet_unregister_lnd (lnd_t *lnd)
00309 {
00310         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
00311 
00312         LASSERT(lnet_find_lnd_by_type(lnd->lnd_type) == lnd);
00313         LASSERT(lnd->lnd_refcount == 0);
00314 
00315         list_del(&lnd->lnd_list);
00316         CDEBUG(D_NET, "%s LND unregistered\n", libcfs_lnd2str(lnd->lnd_type));
00317 
00318         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
00319 }
00320 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_unregister_lnd);
00321 
00322 void
00323 lnet_counters_get(lnet_counters_t *counters)
00324 {
00325         lnet_counters_t *ctr;
00326         int             i;
00327 
00328         memset(counters, 0, sizeof(*counters));
00329 
00330         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00331 
00332         cfs_percpt_for_each(ctr, i, the_lnet.ln_counters) {
00333                 counters->msgs_max     += ctr->msgs_max;
00334                 counters->msgs_alloc   += ctr->msgs_alloc;
00335                 counters->errors       += ctr->errors;
00336                 counters->send_count   += ctr->send_count;
00337                 counters->recv_count   += ctr->recv_count;
00338                 counters->route_count  += ctr->route_count;
00339                 counters->drop_count   += ctr->drop_count;
00340                 counters->send_length  += ctr->send_length;
00341                 counters->recv_length  += ctr->recv_length;
00342                 counters->route_length += ctr->route_length;
00343                 counters->drop_length  += ctr->drop_length;
00344 
00345         }
00346         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00347 }
00348 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_counters_get);
00349 
00350 void
00351 lnet_counters_reset(void)
00352 {
00353         lnet_counters_t *counters;
00354         int             i;
00355 
00356         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00357 
00358         cfs_percpt_for_each(counters, i, the_lnet.ln_counters)
00359                 memset(counters, 0, sizeof(lnet_counters_t));
00360 
00361         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00362 }
00363 
00364 static __u64 lnet_create_interface_cookie(void)
00365 {
00366         /* NB the interface cookie in wire handles guards against delayed
00367          * replies and ACKs appearing valid after reboot. Initialisation time,
00368          * even if it's only implemented to millisecond resolution is probably
00369          * easily good enough. */
00370         struct timeval tv;
00371         __u64          cookie;
00372         do_gettimeofday(&tv);
00373         cookie = tv.tv_sec;
00374         cookie *= 1000000;
00375         cookie += tv.tv_usec;
00376         return cookie;
00377 }
00378 
00379 static char *
00380 lnet_res_type2str(int type)
00381 {
00382         switch (type) {
00383         default:
00384                 LBUG();
00385         case LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_MD:
00386                 return "MD";
00387         case LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_ME:
00388                 return "ME";
00389         case LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_EQ:
00390                 return "EQ";
00391         }
00392 }
00393 
00394 static void
00395 lnet_res_container_cleanup(struct lnet_res_container *rec)
00396 {
00397         int     count = 0;
00398 
00399         if (rec->rec_type == 0) /* not set yet, it's uninitialized */
00400                 return;
00401 
00402         while (!list_empty(&rec->rec_active)) {
00403                 struct list_head *e = rec->rec_active.next;
00404 
00405                 list_del_init(e);
00406                 if (rec->rec_type == LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_EQ) {
00407                         lnet_eq_free(list_entry(e, lnet_eq_t, eq_list));
00408 
00409                 } else if (rec->rec_type == LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_MD) {
00410                         lnet_md_free(list_entry(e, lnet_libmd_t, md_list));
00411 
00412                 } else { /* NB: Active MEs should be attached on portals */
00413                         LBUG();
00414                 }
00415                 count++;
00416         }
00417 
00418         if (count > 0) {
00419                 /* Found alive MD/ME/EQ, user really should unlink/free
00420                  * all of them before finalize LNet, but if someone didn't,
00421                  * we have to recycle garbage for him */
00422                 CERROR("%d active elements on exit of %s container\n",
00423                        count, lnet_res_type2str(rec->rec_type));
00424         }
00425 
00426         if (rec->rec_lh_hash != NULL) {
00427                 LIBCFS_FREE(rec->rec_lh_hash,
00428                             LNET_LH_HASH_SIZE * sizeof(rec->rec_lh_hash[0]));
00429                 rec->rec_lh_hash = NULL;
00430         }
00431 
00432         rec->rec_type = 0; /* mark it as finalized */
00433 }
00434 
00435 static int
00436 lnet_res_container_setup(struct lnet_res_container *rec, int cpt, int type)
00437 {
00438         int     rc = 0;
00439         int     i;
00440 
00441         LASSERT(rec->rec_type == 0);
00442 
00443         rec->rec_type = type;
00444         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rec->rec_active);
00445 
00446         rec->rec_lh_cookie = (cpt << LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_BITS) | type;
00447 
00448         /* Arbitrary choice of hash table size */
00449         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(rec->rec_lh_hash, lnet_cpt_table(), cpt,
00450                          LNET_LH_HASH_SIZE * sizeof(rec->rec_lh_hash[0]));
00451         if (rec->rec_lh_hash == NULL) {
00452                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00453                 goto out;
00454         }
00455 
00456         for (i = 0; i < LNET_LH_HASH_SIZE; i++)
00457                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&rec->rec_lh_hash[i]);
00458 
00459         return 0;
00460 
00461 out:
00462         CERROR("Failed to setup %s resource container\n",
00463                lnet_res_type2str(type));
00464         lnet_res_container_cleanup(rec);
00465         return rc;
00466 }
00467 
00468 static void
00469 lnet_res_containers_destroy(struct lnet_res_container **recs)
00470 {
00471         struct lnet_res_container       *rec;
00472         int                             i;
00473 
00474         cfs_percpt_for_each(rec, i, recs)
00475                 lnet_res_container_cleanup(rec);
00476 
00477         cfs_percpt_free(recs);
00478 }
00479 
00480 static struct lnet_res_container **
00481 lnet_res_containers_create(int type)
00482 {
00483         struct lnet_res_container       **recs;
00484         struct lnet_res_container       *rec;
00485         int                             rc;
00486         int                             i;
00487 
00488         recs = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(), sizeof(*rec));
00489         if (recs == NULL) {
00490                 CERROR("Failed to allocate %s resource containers\n",
00491                        lnet_res_type2str(type));
00492                 return NULL;
00493         }
00494 
00495         cfs_percpt_for_each(rec, i, recs) {
00496                 rc = lnet_res_container_setup(rec, i, type);
00497                 if (rc != 0) {
00498                         lnet_res_containers_destroy(recs);
00499                         return NULL;
00500                 }
00501         }
00502 
00503         return recs;
00504 }
00505 
00506 lnet_libhandle_t *
00507 lnet_res_lh_lookup(struct lnet_res_container *rec, __u64 cookie)
00508 {
00509         /* ALWAYS called with lnet_res_lock held */
00510         struct list_head        *head;
00511         lnet_libhandle_t        *lh;
00512         unsigned int            hash;
00513 
00514         if ((cookie & LNET_COOKIE_MASK) != rec->rec_type)
00515                 return NULL;
00516 
00517         hash = cookie >> (LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_BITS + LNET_CPT_BITS);
00518         head = &rec->rec_lh_hash[hash & LNET_LH_HASH_MASK];
00519 
00520         list_for_each_entry(lh, head, lh_hash_chain) {
00521                 if (lh->lh_cookie == cookie)
00522                         return lh;
00523         }
00524 
00525         return NULL;
00526 }
00527 
00528 void
00529 lnet_res_lh_initialize(struct lnet_res_container *rec, lnet_libhandle_t *lh)
00530 {
00531         /* ALWAYS called with lnet_res_lock held */
00532         unsigned int    ibits = LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_BITS + LNET_CPT_BITS;
00533         unsigned int    hash;
00534 
00535         lh->lh_cookie = rec->rec_lh_cookie;
00536         rec->rec_lh_cookie += 1 << ibits;
00537 
00538         hash = (lh->lh_cookie >> ibits) & LNET_LH_HASH_MASK;
00539 
00540         list_add(&lh->lh_hash_chain, &rec->rec_lh_hash[hash]);
00541 }
00542 
00543 static int lnet_unprepare(void);
00544 
00545 static int
00546 lnet_prepare(lnet_pid_t requested_pid)
00547 {
00548         /* Prepare to bring up the network */
00549         struct lnet_res_container **recs;
00550         int                       rc = 0;
00551 
00552         if (requested_pid == LNET_PID_ANY) {
00553                 /* Don't instantiate LNET just for me */
00554                 return -ENETDOWN;
00555         }
00556 
00557         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount == 0);
00558 
00559         the_lnet.ln_routing = 0;
00560 
00561         LASSERT((requested_pid & LNET_PID_USERFLAG) == 0);
00562         the_lnet.ln_pid = requested_pid;
00563 
00564         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_test_peers);
00565         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_nis);
00566         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt);
00567         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie);
00568         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_routers);
00569         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_drop_rules);
00570         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_delay_rules);
00571 
00572         rc = lnet_create_remote_nets_table();
00573         if (rc != 0)
00574                 goto failed;
00575 
00576         the_lnet.ln_interface_cookie = lnet_create_interface_cookie();
00577 
00578         the_lnet.ln_counters = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00579                                                 sizeof(lnet_counters_t));
00580         if (the_lnet.ln_counters == NULL) {
00581                 CERROR("Failed to allocate counters for LNet\n");
00582                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00583                 goto failed;
00584         }
00585 
00586         rc = lnet_peer_tables_create();
00587         if (rc != 0)
00588                 goto failed;
00589 
00590         rc = lnet_msg_containers_create();
00591         if (rc != 0)
00592                 goto failed;
00593 
00594         rc = lnet_res_container_setup(&the_lnet.ln_eq_container, 0,
00595                                       LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_EQ);
00596         if (rc != 0)
00597                 goto failed;
00598 
00599         recs = lnet_res_containers_create(LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_ME);
00600         if (recs == NULL) {
00601                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00602                 goto failed;
00603         }
00604 
00605         the_lnet.ln_me_containers = recs;
00606 
00607         recs = lnet_res_containers_create(LNET_COOKIE_TYPE_MD);
00608         if (recs == NULL) {
00609                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00610                 goto failed;
00611         }
00612 
00613         the_lnet.ln_md_containers = recs;
00614 
00615         rc = lnet_portals_create();
00616         if (rc != 0) {
00617                 CERROR("Failed to create portals for LNet: %d\n", rc);
00618                 goto failed;
00619         }
00620 
00621         return 0;
00622 
00623  failed:
00624         lnet_unprepare();
00625         return rc;
00626 }
00627 
00628 static int
00629 lnet_unprepare (void)
00630 {
00631         /* NB no LNET_LOCK since this is the last reference.  All LND instances
00632          * have shut down already, so it is safe to unlink and free all
00633          * descriptors, even those that appear committed to a network op (eg MD
00634          * with non-zero pending count) */
00635 
00636         lnet_fail_nid(LNET_NID_ANY, 0);
00637 
00638         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount == 0);
00639         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_test_peers));
00640         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis));
00641         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt));
00642         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie));
00643 
00644         lnet_portals_destroy();
00645 
00646         if (the_lnet.ln_md_containers != NULL) {
00647                 lnet_res_containers_destroy(the_lnet.ln_md_containers);
00648                 the_lnet.ln_md_containers = NULL;
00649         }
00650 
00651         if (the_lnet.ln_me_containers != NULL) {
00652                 lnet_res_containers_destroy(the_lnet.ln_me_containers);
00653                 the_lnet.ln_me_containers = NULL;
00654         }
00655 
00656         lnet_res_container_cleanup(&the_lnet.ln_eq_container);
00657 
00658         lnet_msg_containers_destroy();
00659         lnet_peer_tables_destroy();
00660         lnet_rtrpools_free(0);
00661 
00662         if (the_lnet.ln_counters != NULL) {
00663                 cfs_percpt_free(the_lnet.ln_counters);
00664                 the_lnet.ln_counters = NULL;
00665         }
00666         lnet_destroy_remote_nets_table();
00667 
00668         return 0;
00669 }
00670 
00671 lnet_ni_t  *
00672 lnet_net2ni_locked(__u32 net, int cpt)
00673 {
00674         struct list_head *tmp;
00675         lnet_ni_t        *ni;
00676 
00677         LASSERT(cpt != LNET_LOCK_EX);
00678 
00679         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
00680                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00681 
00682                 if (LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid) == net) {
00683                         lnet_ni_addref_locked(ni, cpt);
00684                         return ni;
00685                 }
00686         }
00687 
00688         return NULL;
00689 }
00690 
00691 lnet_ni_t *
00692 lnet_net2ni(__u32 net)
00693 {
00694         lnet_ni_t *ni;
00695 
00696         lnet_net_lock(0);
00697         ni = lnet_net2ni_locked(net, 0);
00698         lnet_net_unlock(0);
00699 
00700         return ni;
00701 }
00702 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_net2ni);
00703 
00704 static unsigned int
00705 lnet_nid_cpt_hash(lnet_nid_t nid, unsigned int number)
00706 {
00707         __u64           key = nid;
00708         unsigned int    val;
00709 
00710         LASSERT(number >= 1 && number <= LNET_CPT_NUMBER);
00711 
00712         if (number == 1)
00713                 return 0;
00714 
00715         val = hash_long(key, LNET_CPT_BITS);
00716         /* NB: LNET_CP_NUMBER doesn't have to be PO2 */
00717         if (val < number)
00718                 return val;
00719 
00720         return (unsigned int)(key + val + (val >> 1)) % number;
00721 }
00722 
00723 int
00724 lnet_cpt_of_nid_locked(lnet_nid_t nid)
00725 {
00726         struct lnet_ni *ni;
00727 
00728         /* must called with hold of lnet_net_lock */
00729         if (LNET_CPT_NUMBER == 1)
00730                 return 0; /* the only one */
00731 
00732         /* take lnet_net_lock(any) would be OK */
00733         if (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt)) {
00734                 list_for_each_entry(ni, &the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt, ni_cptlist) {
00735                         if (LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid) != LNET_NIDNET(nid))
00736                                 continue;
00737 
00738                         LASSERT(ni->ni_cpts != NULL);
00739                         return ni->ni_cpts[lnet_nid_cpt_hash
00740                                            (nid, ni->ni_ncpts)];
00741                 }
00742         }
00743 
00744         return lnet_nid_cpt_hash(nid, LNET_CPT_NUMBER);
00745 }
00746 
00747 int
00748 lnet_cpt_of_nid(lnet_nid_t nid)
00749 {
00750         int     cpt;
00751         int     cpt2;
00752 
00753         if (LNET_CPT_NUMBER == 1)
00754                 return 0; /* the only one */
00755 
00756         if (list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt))
00757                 return lnet_nid_cpt_hash(nid, LNET_CPT_NUMBER);
00758 
00759         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00760         cpt2 = lnet_cpt_of_nid_locked(nid);
00761         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00762 
00763         return cpt2;
00764 }
00765 EXPORT_SYMBOL(lnet_cpt_of_nid);
00766 
00767 int
00768 lnet_islocalnet(__u32 net)
00769 {
00770         struct lnet_ni  *ni;
00771         int             cpt;
00772 
00773         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00774 
00775         ni = lnet_net2ni_locked(net, cpt);
00776         if (ni != NULL)
00777                 lnet_ni_decref_locked(ni, cpt);
00778 
00779         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00780 
00781         return ni != NULL;
00782 }
00783 
00784 lnet_ni_t  *
00785 lnet_nid2ni_locked(lnet_nid_t nid, int cpt)
00786 {
00787         struct lnet_ni   *ni;
00788         struct list_head *tmp;
00789 
00790         LASSERT(cpt != LNET_LOCK_EX);
00791 
00792         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
00793                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00794 
00795                 if (ni->ni_nid == nid) {
00796                         lnet_ni_addref_locked(ni, cpt);
00797                         return ni;
00798                 }
00799         }
00800 
00801         return NULL;
00802 }
00803 
00804 int
00805 lnet_islocalnid(lnet_nid_t nid)
00806 {
00807         struct lnet_ni  *ni;
00808         int             cpt;
00809 
00810         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00811         ni = lnet_nid2ni_locked(nid, cpt);
00812         if (ni != NULL)
00813                 lnet_ni_decref_locked(ni, cpt);
00814         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00815 
00816         return ni != NULL;
00817 }
00818 
00819 int
00820 lnet_count_acceptor_nis (void)
00821 {
00822         /* Return the # of NIs that need the acceptor. */
00823         int              count = 0;
00824         struct list_head *tmp;
00825         struct lnet_ni   *ni;
00826         int              cpt;
00827 
00828         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
00829         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
00830                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
00831 
00832                 if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_accept != NULL)
00833                         count++;
00834         }
00835 
00836         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
00837 
00838         return count;
00839 }
00840 
00841 static lnet_ping_info_t *
00842 lnet_ping_info_create(int num_ni)
00843 {
00844         lnet_ping_info_t *ping_info;
00845         unsigned int     infosz;
00846 
00847         infosz = offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[num_ni]);
00848         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ping_info, infosz);
00849         if (ping_info == NULL) {
00850                 CERROR("Can't allocate ping info[%d]\n", num_ni);
00851                 return NULL;
00852         }
00853 
00854         ping_info->pi_nnis = num_ni;
00855         ping_info->pi_pid = the_lnet.ln_pid;
00856         ping_info->pi_magic = LNET_PROTO_PING_MAGIC;
00857         ping_info->pi_features = LNET_PING_FEAT_NI_STATUS;
00858 
00859         return ping_info;
00860 }
00861 
00862 static inline int
00863 lnet_get_ni_count(void)
00864 {
00865         struct lnet_ni *ni;
00866         int            count = 0;
00867 
00868         lnet_net_lock(0);
00869 
00870         list_for_each_entry(ni, &the_lnet.ln_nis, ni_list)
00871                 count++;
00872 
00873         lnet_net_unlock(0);
00874 
00875         return count;
00876 }
00877 
00878 static inline void
00879 lnet_ping_info_free(lnet_ping_info_t *pinfo)
00880 {
00881         LIBCFS_FREE(pinfo,
00882                     offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t,
00883                              pi_ni[pinfo->pi_nnis]));
00884 }
00885 
00886 static void
00887 lnet_ping_info_destroy(void)
00888 {
00889         struct lnet_ni  *ni;
00890 
00891         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00892 
00893         list_for_each_entry(ni, &the_lnet.ln_nis, ni_list) {
00894                 lnet_ni_lock(ni);
00895                 ni->ni_status = NULL;
00896                 lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
00897         }
00898 
00899         lnet_ping_info_free(the_lnet.ln_ping_info);
00900         the_lnet.ln_ping_info = NULL;
00901 
00902         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
00903 }
00904 
00905 static void
00906 lnet_ping_event_handler(lnet_event_t *event)
00907 {
00908         lnet_ping_info_t *pinfo = event->md.user_ptr;
00909 
00910         if (event->unlinked)
00911                 pinfo->pi_features = LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL;
00912 }
00913 
00914 static int
00915 lnet_ping_info_setup(lnet_ping_info_t **ppinfo, lnet_handle_md_t *md_handle,
00916                      int ni_count, bool set_eq)
00917 {
00918         lnet_handle_me_t  me_handle;
00919         lnet_process_id_t id = {LNET_NID_ANY, LNET_PID_ANY};
00920         lnet_md_t         md = {NULL};
00921         int               rc, rc2;
00922 
00923         if (set_eq) {
00924                 rc = LNetEQAlloc(0, lnet_ping_event_handler,
00925                                  &the_lnet.ln_ping_target_eq);
00926                 if (rc != 0) {
00927                         CERROR("Can't allocate ping EQ: %d\n", rc);
00928                         return rc;
00929                 }
00930         }
00931 
00932         *ppinfo = lnet_ping_info_create(ni_count);
00933         if (*ppinfo == NULL) {
00934                 rc = -ENOMEM;
00935                 goto failed_0;
00936         }
00937 
00938         rc = LNetMEAttach(LNET_RESERVED_PORTAL, id,
00939                           LNET_PROTO_PING_MATCHBITS, 0,
00940                           LNET_UNLINK, LNET_INS_AFTER,
00941                           &me_handle);
00942         if (rc != 0) {
00943                 CERROR("Can't create ping ME: %d\n", rc);
00944                 goto failed_1;
00945         }
00946 
00947         /* initialize md content */
00948         md.start     = *ppinfo;
00949         md.length    = offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t,
00950                                 pi_ni[(*ppinfo)->pi_nnis]);
00951         md.threshold = LNET_MD_THRESH_INF;
00952         md.max_size  = 0;
00953         md.options   = LNET_MD_OP_GET | LNET_MD_TRUNCATE |
00954                        LNET_MD_MANAGE_REMOTE;
00955         md.user_ptr  = NULL;
00956         md.eq_handle = the_lnet.ln_ping_target_eq;
00957         md.user_ptr = *ppinfo;
00958 
00959         rc = LNetMDAttach(me_handle, md, LNET_RETAIN, md_handle);
00960         if (rc != 0) {
00961                 CERROR("Can't attach ping MD: %d\n", rc);
00962                 goto failed_2;
00963         }
00964 
00965         return 0;
00966 
00967 failed_2:
00968         rc2 = LNetMEUnlink(me_handle);
00969         LASSERT(rc2 == 0);
00970 failed_1:
00971         lnet_ping_info_free(*ppinfo);
00972         *ppinfo = NULL;
00973 failed_0:
00974         if (set_eq)
00975                 LNetEQFree(the_lnet.ln_ping_target_eq);
00976         return rc;
00977 }
00978 
00979 static void
00980 lnet_ping_md_unlink(lnet_ping_info_t *pinfo, lnet_handle_md_t *md_handle)
00981 {
00982         sigset_t        blocked = cfs_block_allsigs();
00983 
00984         LNetMDUnlink(*md_handle);
00985         LNetInvalidateHandle(md_handle);
00986 
00987         /* NB md could be busy; this just starts the unlink */
00988         while (pinfo->pi_features != LNET_PING_FEAT_INVAL) {
00989                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "Still waiting for ping MD to unlink\n");
00990                 set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
00991                 schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1));
00992         }
00993 
00994         cfs_restore_sigs(blocked);
00995 }
00996 
00997 static void
00998 lnet_ping_info_install_locked(lnet_ping_info_t *ping_info)
00999 {
01000         int                     i;
01001         lnet_ni_t               *ni;
01002         lnet_ni_status_t        *ns;
01003 
01004         i = 0;
01005         list_for_each_entry(ni, &the_lnet.ln_nis, ni_list) {
01006                 LASSERT(i < ping_info->pi_nnis);
01007 
01008                 ns = &ping_info->pi_ni[i];
01009 
01010                 ns->ns_nid = ni->ni_nid;
01011 
01012                 lnet_ni_lock(ni);
01013                 ns->ns_status = (ni->ni_status != NULL) ?
01014                                 ni->ni_status->ns_status : LNET_NI_STATUS_UP;
01015                 ni->ni_status = ns;
01016                 lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
01017 
01018                 i++;
01019         }
01020 }
01021 
01022 static void
01023 lnet_ping_target_update(lnet_ping_info_t *pinfo, lnet_handle_md_t md_handle)
01024 {
01025         lnet_ping_info_t *old_pinfo = NULL;
01026         lnet_handle_md_t old_md;
01027 
01028         /* switch the NIs to point to the new ping info created */
01029         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01030 
01031         if (!the_lnet.ln_routing)
01032                 pinfo->pi_features |= LNET_PING_FEAT_RTE_DISABLED;
01033         lnet_ping_info_install_locked(pinfo);
01034 
01035         if (the_lnet.ln_ping_info != NULL) {
01036                 old_pinfo = the_lnet.ln_ping_info;
01037                 old_md = the_lnet.ln_ping_target_md;
01038         }
01039         the_lnet.ln_ping_target_md = md_handle;
01040         the_lnet.ln_ping_info = pinfo;
01041 
01042         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01043 
01044         if (old_pinfo != NULL) {
01045                 /* unlink the old ping info */
01046                 lnet_ping_md_unlink(old_pinfo, &old_md);
01047                 lnet_ping_info_free(old_pinfo);
01048         }
01049 }
01050 
01051 static void
01052 lnet_ping_target_fini(void)
01053 {
01054         int             rc;
01055 
01056         lnet_ping_md_unlink(the_lnet.ln_ping_info,
01057                             &the_lnet.ln_ping_target_md);
01058 
01059         rc = LNetEQFree(the_lnet.ln_ping_target_eq);
01060         LASSERT(rc == 0);
01061 
01062         lnet_ping_info_destroy();
01063 }
01064 
01065 static int
01066 lnet_ni_tq_credits(lnet_ni_t *ni)
01067 {
01068         int     credits;
01069 
01070         LASSERT(ni->ni_ncpts >= 1);
01071 
01072         if (ni->ni_ncpts == 1)
01073                 return ni->ni_maxtxcredits;
01074 
01075         credits = ni->ni_maxtxcredits / ni->ni_ncpts;
01076         credits = max(credits, 8 * ni->ni_peertxcredits);
01077         credits = min(credits, ni->ni_maxtxcredits);
01078 
01079         return credits;
01080 }
01081 
01082 static void
01083 lnet_ni_unlink_locked(lnet_ni_t *ni)
01084 {
01085         if (!list_empty(&ni->ni_cptlist)) {
01086                 list_del_init(&ni->ni_cptlist);
01087                 lnet_ni_decref_locked(ni, 0);
01088         }
01089 
01090         /* move it to zombie list and nobody can find it anymore */
01091         LASSERT(!list_empty(&ni->ni_list));
01092         list_move(&ni->ni_list, &the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie);
01093         lnet_ni_decref_locked(ni, 0);   /* drop ln_nis' ref */
01094 }
01095 
01096 static void
01097 lnet_clear_zombies_nis_locked(void)
01098 {
01099         int             i;
01100         int             islo;
01101         lnet_ni_t       *ni;
01102 
01103         /* Now wait for the NI's I just nuked to show up on ln_zombie_nis
01104          * and shut them down in guaranteed thread context */
01105         i = 2;
01106         while (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie)) {
01107                 int     *ref;
01108                 int     j;
01109 
01110                 ni = list_entry(the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie.next,
01111                                 lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
01112                 list_del_init(&ni->ni_list);
01113                 cfs_percpt_for_each(ref, j, ni->ni_refs) {
01114                         if (*ref == 0)
01115                                 continue;
01116                         /* still busy, add it back to zombie list */
01117                         list_add(&ni->ni_list, &the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie);
01118                         break;
01119                 }
01120 
01121                 if (!list_empty(&ni->ni_list)) {
01122                         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01123                         ++i;
01124                         if ((i & (-i)) == i) {
01125                                 CDEBUG(D_WARNING,
01126                                        "Waiting for zombie LNI %s\n",
01127                                        libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid));
01128                         }
01129                         set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
01130                         schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1));
01131                         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01132                         continue;
01133                 }
01134 
01135                 ni->ni_lnd->lnd_refcount--;
01136                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01137 
01138                 islo = ni->ni_lnd->lnd_type == LOLND;
01139 
01140                 LASSERT(!in_interrupt());
01141                 (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_shutdown)(ni);
01142 
01143                 /* can't deref lnd anymore now; it might have unregistered
01144                  * itself...  */
01145 
01146                 if (!islo)
01147                         CDEBUG(D_LNI, "Removed LNI %s\n",
01148                               libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid));
01149 
01150                 lnet_ni_free(ni);
01151                 i = 2;
01152                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01153         }
01154 }
01155 
01156 static void
01157 lnet_shutdown_lndnis(void)
01158 {
01159         int             i;
01160         lnet_ni_t       *ni;
01161 
01162         /* NB called holding the global mutex */
01163 
01164         /* All quiet on the API front */
01165         LASSERT(!the_lnet.ln_shutdown);
01166         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount == 0);
01167         LASSERT(list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis_zombie));
01168 
01169         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01170         the_lnet.ln_shutdown = 1;       /* flag shutdown */
01171 
01172         /* Unlink NIs from the global table */
01173         while (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_nis)) {
01174                 ni = list_entry(the_lnet.ln_nis.next,
01175                                 lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
01176                 lnet_ni_unlink_locked(ni);
01177         }
01178 
01179         /* Drop the cached loopback NI. */
01180         if (the_lnet.ln_loni != NULL) {
01181                 lnet_ni_decref_locked(the_lnet.ln_loni, 0);
01182                 the_lnet.ln_loni = NULL;
01183         }
01184 
01185         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01186 
01187         /* Clear lazy portals and drop delayed messages which hold refs
01188          * on their lnet_msg_t::msg_rxpeer */
01189         for (i = 0; i < the_lnet.ln_nportals; i++)
01190                 LNetClearLazyPortal(i);
01191 
01192         /* Clear the peer table and wait for all peers to go (they hold refs on
01193          * their NIs) */
01194         lnet_peer_tables_cleanup(NULL);
01195 
01196         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01197 
01198         lnet_clear_zombies_nis_locked();
01199         the_lnet.ln_shutdown = 0;
01200         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01201 }
01202 
01203 /* shutdown down the NI and release refcount */
01204 static void
01205 lnet_shutdown_lndni(struct lnet_ni *ni)
01206 {
01207         int i;
01208 
01209         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01210         lnet_ni_unlink_locked(ni);
01211         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01212 
01213         /* clear messages for this NI on the lazy portal */
01214         for (i = 0; i < the_lnet.ln_nportals; i++)
01215                 lnet_clear_lazy_portal(ni, i, "Shutting down NI");
01216 
01217         /* Do peer table cleanup for this ni */
01218         lnet_peer_tables_cleanup(ni);
01219 
01220         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01221         lnet_clear_zombies_nis_locked();
01222         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01223 }
01224 
01225 static int
01226 lnet_startup_lndni(struct lnet_ni *ni, struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *conf)
01227 {
01228         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_tunables = NULL;
01229         int                     rc = -EINVAL;
01230         __u32                   lnd_type;
01231         lnd_t                   *lnd;
01232         struct lnet_tx_queue    *tq;
01233         int                     i;
01234 
01235         lnd_type = LNET_NETTYP(LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid));
01236 
01237         LASSERT(libcfs_isknown_lnd(lnd_type));
01238 
01239         if (lnd_type == CIBLND || lnd_type == OPENIBLND ||
01240             lnd_type == IIBLND || lnd_type == VIBLND) {
01241                 CERROR("LND %s obsoleted\n", libcfs_lnd2str(lnd_type));
01242                 goto failed0;
01243         }
01244 
01245         /* Make sure this new NI is unique. */
01246         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01247         rc = lnet_net_unique(LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid), &the_lnet.ln_nis);
01248         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01249 
01250         if (!rc) {
01251                 if (lnd_type == LOLND) {
01252                         lnet_ni_free(ni);
01253                         return 0;
01254                 }
01255 
01256                 CERROR("Net %s is not unique\n",
01257                        libcfs_net2str(LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid)));
01258 
01259                 rc = -EEXIST;
01260                 goto failed0;
01261         }
01262 
01263         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01264         lnd = lnet_find_lnd_by_type(lnd_type);
01265 
01266         if (lnd == NULL) {
01267                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01268                 rc = request_module("%s", libcfs_lnd2modname(lnd_type));
01269                 mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01270 
01271                 lnd = lnet_find_lnd_by_type(lnd_type);
01272                 if (lnd == NULL) {
01273                         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01274                         CERROR("Can't load LND %s, module %s, rc=%d\n",
01275                                libcfs_lnd2str(lnd_type),
01276                                libcfs_lnd2modname(lnd_type), rc);
01277 #ifndef HAVE_MODULE_LOADING_SUPPORT
01278                         LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x104, "Your kernel must be "
01279                                            "compiled with kernel module "
01280                                            "loading support.");
01281 #endif
01282                         rc = -EINVAL;
01283                         goto failed0;
01284                 }
01285         }
01286 
01287         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01288         lnd->lnd_refcount++;
01289         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01290 
01291         ni->ni_lnd = lnd;
01292 
01293         if (conf && conf->cfg_hdr.ioc_len > sizeof(*conf))
01294                 lnd_tunables = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *)conf->cfg_bulk;
01295 
01296         if (lnd_tunables != NULL) {
01297                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(ni->ni_lnd_tunables,
01298                              sizeof(*ni->ni_lnd_tunables));
01299                 if (ni->ni_lnd_tunables == NULL) {
01300                         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01301                         rc = -ENOMEM;
01302                         goto failed0;
01303                 }
01304                 memcpy(ni->ni_lnd_tunables, lnd_tunables,
01305                        sizeof(*ni->ni_lnd_tunables));
01306         }
01307 
01308         rc = (lnd->lnd_startup)(ni);
01309 
01310         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_lnd_mutex);
01311 
01312         if (rc != 0) {
01313                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x105, "Error %d starting up LNI %s\n",
01314                                    rc, libcfs_lnd2str(lnd->lnd_type));
01315                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01316                 lnd->lnd_refcount--;
01317                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01318                 goto failed0;
01319         }
01320 
01321         /* If given some LND tunable parameters, parse those now to
01322          * override the values in the NI structure. */
01323         if (conf && conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_rtr_credits >= 0) {
01324                 ni->ni_peerrtrcredits =
01325                         conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_rtr_credits;
01326         }
01327         if (conf && conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_timeout >= 0) {
01328                 ni->ni_peertimeout =
01329                         conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_timeout;
01330         }
01331 
01332         /*
01333          * TODO
01334          * Note: For now, don't allow the user to change
01335          * peertxcredits as this number is used in the
01336          * IB LND to control queue depth.
01337          *
01338          * if (conf && conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_tx_credits != -1)
01339          *      ni->ni_peertxcredits =
01340          *              conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_tx_credits;
01341          */
01342         if (conf && conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_max_tx_credits >= 0) {
01343                 ni->ni_maxtxcredits =
01344                         conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_max_tx_credits;
01345         }
01346 
01347         LASSERT(ni->ni_peertimeout <= 0 || lnd->lnd_query != NULL);
01348 
01349         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01350         /* refcount for ln_nis */
01351         lnet_ni_addref_locked(ni, 0);
01352         list_add_tail(&ni->ni_list, &the_lnet.ln_nis);
01353         if (ni->ni_cpts != NULL) {
01354                 lnet_ni_addref_locked(ni, 0);
01355                 list_add_tail(&ni->ni_cptlist, &the_lnet.ln_nis_cpt);
01356         }
01357 
01358         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01359 
01360         if (lnd->lnd_type == LOLND) {
01361                 lnet_ni_addref(ni);
01362                 LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_loni == NULL);
01363                 the_lnet.ln_loni = ni;
01364                 return 0;
01365         }
01366 
01367         if (ni->ni_peertxcredits == 0 || ni->ni_maxtxcredits == 0) {
01368                 LCONSOLE_ERROR_MSG(0x107, "LNI %s has no %scredits\n",
01369                                    libcfs_lnd2str(lnd->lnd_type),
01370                                    ni->ni_peertxcredits == 0 ?
01371                                         "" : "per-peer ");
01372                 /* shutdown the NI since if we get here then it must've already
01373                  * been started
01374                  */
01375                 lnet_shutdown_lndni(ni);
01376                 return -EINVAL;
01377         }
01378 
01379         cfs_percpt_for_each(tq, i, ni->ni_tx_queues) {
01380                 tq->tq_credits_min =
01381                 tq->tq_credits_max =
01382                 tq->tq_credits = lnet_ni_tq_credits(ni);
01383         }
01384 
01385         CDEBUG(D_LNI, "Added LNI %s [%d/%d/%d/%d]\n",
01386                 libcfs_nid2str(ni->ni_nid), ni->ni_peertxcredits,
01387                 lnet_ni_tq_credits(ni) * LNET_CPT_NUMBER,
01388                 ni->ni_peerrtrcredits, ni->ni_peertimeout);
01389 
01390         return 0;
01391 failed0:
01392         lnet_ni_free(ni);
01393         return rc;
01394 }
01395 
01396 static int
01397 lnet_startup_lndnis(struct list_head *nilist)
01398 {
01399         struct lnet_ni          *ni;
01400         int                     rc;
01401         int                     ni_count = 0;
01402 
01403         while (!list_empty(nilist)) {
01404                 ni = list_entry(nilist->next, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
01405                 list_del(&ni->ni_list);
01406                 rc = lnet_startup_lndni(ni, NULL);
01407 
01408                 if (rc < 0)
01409                         goto failed;
01410 
01411                 ni_count++;
01412         }
01413 
01414         return ni_count;
01415 failed:
01416         lnet_shutdown_lndnis();
01417 
01418         return rc;
01419 }
01420 
01431 int lnet_lib_init(void)
01432 {
01433         int rc;
01434 
01435         lnet_assert_wire_constants();
01436 
01437         memset(&the_lnet, 0, sizeof(the_lnet));
01438 
01439         /* refer to global cfs_cpt_table for now */
01440         the_lnet.ln_cpt_table   = cfs_cpt_table;
01441         the_lnet.ln_cpt_number  = cfs_cpt_number(cfs_cpt_table);
01442 
01443         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_cpt_number > 0);
01444         if (the_lnet.ln_cpt_number > LNET_CPT_MAX) {
01445                 /* we are under risk of consuming all lh_cookie */
01446                 CERROR("Can't have %d CPTs for LNet (max allowed is %d), "
01447                        "please change setting of CPT-table and retry\n",
01448                        the_lnet.ln_cpt_number, LNET_CPT_MAX);
01449                 return -E2BIG;
01450         }
01451 
01452         while ((1 << the_lnet.ln_cpt_bits) < the_lnet.ln_cpt_number)
01453                 the_lnet.ln_cpt_bits++;
01454 
01455         rc = lnet_create_locks();
01456         if (rc != 0) {
01457                 CERROR("Can't create LNet global locks: %d\n", rc);
01458                 return rc;
01459         }
01460 
01461         the_lnet.ln_refcount = 0;
01462         LNetInvalidateHandle(&the_lnet.ln_rc_eqh);
01463         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_lnds);
01464         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_zombie);
01465         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&the_lnet.ln_rcd_deathrow);
01466 
01467         /* The hash table size is the number of bits it takes to express the set
01468          * ln_num_routes, minus 1 (better to under estimate than over so we
01469          * don't waste memory). */
01470         if (rnet_htable_size <= 0)
01471                 rnet_htable_size = LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_DEFAULT;
01472         else if (rnet_htable_size > LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_MAX)
01473                 rnet_htable_size = LNET_REMOTE_NETS_HASH_MAX;
01474         the_lnet.ln_remote_nets_hbits = max_t(int, 1,
01475                                            order_base_2(rnet_htable_size) - 1);
01476 
01477         /* All LNDs apart from the LOLND are in separate modules.  They
01478          * register themselves when their module loads, and unregister
01479          * themselves when their module is unloaded. */
01480         lnet_register_lnd(&the_lolnd);
01481         return 0;
01482 }
01483 
01490 void lnet_lib_exit(void)
01491 {
01492         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount == 0);
01493 
01494         while (!list_empty(&the_lnet.ln_lnds))
01495                 lnet_unregister_lnd(list_entry(the_lnet.ln_lnds.next,
01496                                                lnd_t, lnd_list));
01497         lnet_destroy_locks();
01498 }
01499 
01515 int
01516 LNetNIInit(lnet_pid_t requested_pid)
01517 {
01518         int                     im_a_router = 0;
01519         int                     rc;
01520         int                     ni_count;
01521         lnet_ping_info_t        *pinfo;
01522         lnet_handle_md_t        md_handle;
01523         struct list_head        net_head;
01524 
01525         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&net_head);
01526 
01527         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01528 
01529         CDEBUG(D_OTHER, "refs %d\n", the_lnet.ln_refcount);
01530 
01531         if (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0) {
01532                 rc = the_lnet.ln_refcount++;
01533                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01534                 return rc;
01535         }
01536 
01537         rc = lnet_prepare(requested_pid);
01538         if (rc != 0) {
01539                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01540                 return rc;
01541         }
01542 
01543         /* Add in the loopback network */
01544         if (lnet_ni_alloc(LNET_MKNET(LOLND, 0), NULL, &net_head) == NULL) {
01545                 rc = -ENOMEM;
01546                 goto failed0;
01547         }
01548 
01549         /* If LNet is being initialized via DLC it is possible
01550          * that the user requests not to load module parameters (ones which
01551          * are supported by DLC) on initialization.  Therefore, make sure not
01552          * to load networks, routes and forwarding from module parameters
01553          * in this case.  On cleanup in case of failure only clean up
01554          * routes if it has been loaded */
01555         if (!the_lnet.ln_nis_from_mod_params) {
01556                 rc = lnet_parse_networks(&net_head,
01557                                          lnet_get_networks());
01558                 if (rc < 0)
01559                         goto failed0;
01560         }
01561 
01562         ni_count = lnet_startup_lndnis(&net_head);
01563         if (ni_count < 0) {
01564                 rc = ni_count;
01565                 goto failed0;
01566         }
01567 
01568         if (!the_lnet.ln_nis_from_mod_params) {
01569                 rc = lnet_parse_routes(lnet_get_routes(), &im_a_router);
01570                 if (rc != 0)
01571                         goto failed1;
01572 
01573                 rc = lnet_check_routes();
01574                 if (rc != 0)
01575                         goto failed2;
01576 
01577                 rc = lnet_rtrpools_alloc(im_a_router);
01578                 if (rc != 0)
01579                         goto failed2;
01580         }
01581 
01582         rc = lnet_acceptor_start();
01583         if (rc != 0)
01584                 goto failed2;
01585         the_lnet.ln_refcount = 1;
01586         /* Now I may use my own API functions... */
01587 
01588         rc = lnet_ping_info_setup(&pinfo, &md_handle, ni_count, true);
01589         if (rc != 0)
01590                 goto failed3;
01591 
01592         lnet_ping_target_update(pinfo, md_handle);
01593 
01594         rc = lnet_router_checker_start();
01595         if (rc != 0)
01596                 goto failed4;
01597 
01598         lnet_fault_init();
01599         lnet_proc_init();
01600 
01601         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01602 
01603         return 0;
01604 
01605 failed4:
01606         lnet_ping_target_fini();
01607 failed3:
01608         the_lnet.ln_refcount = 0;
01609         lnet_acceptor_stop();
01610 failed2:
01611         if (!the_lnet.ln_nis_from_mod_params)
01612                 lnet_destroy_routes();
01613 failed1:
01614         lnet_shutdown_lndnis();
01615 failed0:
01616         lnet_unprepare();
01617         LASSERT(rc < 0);
01618         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01619         while (!list_empty(&net_head)) {
01620                 struct lnet_ni *ni;
01621                 ni = list_entry(net_head.next, struct lnet_ni, ni_list);
01622                 list_del_init(&ni->ni_list);
01623                 lnet_ni_free(ni);
01624         }
01625         return rc;
01626 }
01627 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetNIInit);
01628 
01638 int
01639 LNetNIFini()
01640 {
01641         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01642 
01643         LASSERT (the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
01644 
01645         if (the_lnet.ln_refcount != 1) {
01646                 the_lnet.ln_refcount--;
01647         } else {
01648                 LASSERT(!the_lnet.ln_niinit_self);
01649 
01650                 lnet_fault_fini();
01651 
01652                 lnet_proc_fini();
01653                 lnet_router_checker_stop();
01654                 lnet_ping_target_fini();
01655 
01656                 /* Teardown fns that use my own API functions BEFORE here */
01657                 the_lnet.ln_refcount = 0;
01658 
01659                 lnet_acceptor_stop();
01660                 lnet_destroy_routes();
01661                 lnet_shutdown_lndnis();
01662                 lnet_unprepare();
01663         }
01664 
01665         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01666         return 0;
01667 }
01668 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetNIFini);
01669 
01683 static void
01684 lnet_fill_ni_info(struct lnet_ni *ni, struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *config)
01685 {
01686         struct lnet_ioctl_net_config *net_config;
01687         struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *lnd_cfg = NULL;
01688         size_t min_size, tunable_size = 0;
01689         int i;
01690 
01691         if (!ni || !config)
01692                 return;
01693 
01694         net_config = (struct lnet_ioctl_net_config *) config->cfg_bulk;
01695         if (!net_config)
01696                 return;
01697 
01698         CLASSERT(ARRAY_SIZE(ni->ni_interfaces) ==
01699                  ARRAY_SIZE(net_config->ni_interfaces));
01700 
01701         if (ni->ni_interfaces[0] != NULL) {
01702                 for (i = 0; i < ARRAY_SIZE(ni->ni_interfaces); i++) {
01703                         if (ni->ni_interfaces[i] != NULL) {
01704                                 strncpy(net_config->ni_interfaces[i],
01705                                         ni->ni_interfaces[i],
01706                                         sizeof(net_config->ni_interfaces[i]));
01707                         }
01708                 }
01709         }
01710 
01711         config->cfg_nid = ni->ni_nid;
01712         config->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_timeout = ni->ni_peertimeout;
01713         config->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_max_tx_credits = ni->ni_maxtxcredits;
01714         config->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_tx_credits = ni->ni_peertxcredits;
01715         config->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_peer_rtr_credits = ni->ni_peerrtrcredits;
01716 
01717         net_config->ni_status = ni->ni_status->ns_status;
01718 
01719         for (i = 0;
01720              ni->ni_cpts != NULL && i < ni->ni_ncpts &&
01721              i < LNET_MAX_SHOW_NUM_CPT;
01722              i++)
01723                 net_config->ni_cpts[i] = ni->ni_cpts[i];
01724 
01725         config->cfg_ncpts = ni->ni_ncpts;
01726 
01727         /*
01728          * See if user land tools sent in a newer and larger version
01729          * of struct lnet_tunables than what the kernel uses.
01730          */
01731         min_size = sizeof(*config) + sizeof(*net_config);
01732 
01733         if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len > min_size)
01734                 tunable_size = config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len - min_size;
01735 
01736         /* Don't copy to much data to user space */
01737         min_size = min(tunable_size, sizeof(*ni->ni_lnd_tunables));
01738         lnd_cfg = (struct lnet_ioctl_config_lnd_tunables *)net_config->cfg_bulk;
01739 
01740         if (ni->ni_lnd_tunables && lnd_cfg && min_size) {
01741                 memcpy(lnd_cfg, ni->ni_lnd_tunables, min_size);
01742                 config->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_interface_count = 1;
01743 
01744                 /* Tell user land that kernel side has less data */
01745                 if (tunable_size > sizeof(*ni->ni_lnd_tunables)) {
01746                         min_size = tunable_size - sizeof(ni->ni_lnd_tunables);
01747                         config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len -= min_size;
01748                 }
01749         }
01750 }
01751 
01752 static int
01753 lnet_get_net_config(struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *config)
01754 {
01755         struct lnet_ni *ni;
01756         struct list_head *tmp;
01757         int idx = config->cfg_count;
01758         int rc = -ENOENT;
01759         int cpt;
01760 
01761         if (unlikely(!config->cfg_bulk))
01762                 return -EINVAL;
01763 
01764         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
01765 
01766         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
01767                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
01768                 if (idx-- == 0) {
01769                         rc = 0;
01770                         lnet_ni_lock(ni);
01771                         lnet_fill_ni_info(ni, config);
01772                         lnet_ni_unlock(ni);
01773                         break;
01774                 }
01775         }
01776 
01777         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
01778         return rc;
01779 }
01780 
01781 int
01782 lnet_dyn_add_ni(lnet_pid_t requested_pid, struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *conf)
01783 {
01784         char                    *nets = conf->cfg_config_u.cfg_net.net_intf;
01785         lnet_ping_info_t        *pinfo;
01786         lnet_handle_md_t        md_handle;
01787         struct lnet_ni          *ni;
01788         struct list_head        net_head;
01789         int                     rc;
01790         lnet_remotenet_t        *rnet;
01791 
01792         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&net_head);
01793 
01794         /* Create a ni structure for the network string */
01795         rc = lnet_parse_networks(&net_head, nets);
01796         if (rc <= 0)
01797                 return rc == 0 ? -EINVAL : rc;
01798 
01799         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01800 
01801         if (rc > 1) {
01802                 rc = -EINVAL; /* only add one interface per call */
01803                 goto failed0;
01804         }
01805 
01806         ni = list_entry(net_head.next, struct lnet_ni, ni_list);
01807 
01808         lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01809         rnet = lnet_find_net_locked(LNET_NIDNET(ni->ni_nid));
01810         lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
01811         /* make sure that the net added doesn't invalidate the current
01812          * configuration LNet is keeping */
01813         if (rnet != NULL) {
01814                 CERROR("Adding net %s will invalidate routing configuration\n",
01815                        nets);
01816                 rc = -EUSERS;
01817                 goto failed0;
01818         }
01819 
01820         rc = lnet_ping_info_setup(&pinfo, &md_handle, 1 + lnet_get_ni_count(),
01821                                   false);
01822         if (rc != 0)
01823                 goto failed0;
01824 
01825         list_del_init(&ni->ni_list);
01826 
01827         rc = lnet_startup_lndni(ni, conf);
01828         if (rc != 0)
01829                 goto failed1;
01830 
01831         if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_accept != NULL) {
01832                 rc = lnet_acceptor_start();
01833                 if (rc < 0) {
01834                         /* shutdown the ni that we just started */
01835                         CERROR("Failed to start up acceptor thread\n");
01836                         lnet_shutdown_lndni(ni);
01837                         goto failed1;
01838                 }
01839         }
01840 
01841         lnet_ping_target_update(pinfo, md_handle);
01842         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01843 
01844         return 0;
01845 
01846 failed1:
01847         lnet_ping_md_unlink(pinfo, &md_handle);
01848         lnet_ping_info_free(pinfo);
01849 failed0:
01850         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01851         while (!list_empty(&net_head)) {
01852                 ni = list_entry(net_head.next, struct lnet_ni, ni_list);
01853                 list_del_init(&ni->ni_list);
01854                 lnet_ni_free(ni);
01855         }
01856         return rc;
01857 }
01858 
01859 int
01860 lnet_dyn_del_ni(__u32 net)
01861 {
01862         lnet_ni_t        *ni;
01863         lnet_ping_info_t *pinfo;
01864         lnet_handle_md_t  md_handle;
01865         int               rc;
01866 
01867         /* don't allow userspace to shutdown the LOLND */
01868         if (LNET_NETTYP(net) == LOLND)
01869                 return -EINVAL;
01870 
01871         mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01872         /* create and link a new ping info, before removing the old one */
01873         rc = lnet_ping_info_setup(&pinfo, &md_handle,
01874                                   lnet_get_ni_count() - 1, false);
01875         if (rc != 0)
01876                 goto out;
01877 
01878         ni = lnet_net2ni(net);
01879         if (ni == NULL) {
01880                 rc = -EINVAL;
01881                 goto failed;
01882         }
01883 
01884         /* decrement the reference counter taken by lnet_net2ni() */
01885         lnet_ni_decref_locked(ni, 0);
01886 
01887         lnet_shutdown_lndni(ni);
01888 
01889         if (lnet_count_acceptor_nis() == 0)
01890                 lnet_acceptor_stop();
01891 
01892         lnet_ping_target_update(pinfo, md_handle);
01893         goto out;
01894 failed:
01895         lnet_ping_md_unlink(pinfo, &md_handle);
01896         lnet_ping_info_free(pinfo);
01897 out:
01898         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01899 
01900         return rc;
01901 }
01902 
01907 int
01908 LNetCtl(unsigned int cmd, void *arg)
01909 {
01910         struct libcfs_ioctl_data *data = arg;
01911         struct lnet_ioctl_config_data *config;
01912         lnet_process_id_t         id = {0};
01913         lnet_ni_t                *ni;
01914         int                       rc;
01915 
01916         CLASSERT(LIBCFS_IOC_DATA_MAX >= sizeof(struct lnet_ioctl_net_config) +
01917                                         sizeof(struct lnet_ioctl_config_data));
01918 
01919         switch (cmd) {
01920         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_NI:
01921                 rc = LNetGetId(data->ioc_count, &id);
01922                 data->ioc_nid = id.nid;
01923                 return rc;
01924 
01925         case IOC_LIBCFS_FAIL_NID:
01926                 return lnet_fail_nid(data->ioc_nid, data->ioc_count);
01927 
01928         case IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_ROUTE:
01929                 config = arg;
01930 
01931                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*config))
01932                         return -EINVAL;
01933 
01934                 mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01935                 rc = lnet_add_route(config->cfg_net,
01936                                     config->cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_hop,
01937                                     config->cfg_nid,
01938                                     config->cfg_config_u.cfg_route.
01939                                         rtr_priority);
01940                 if (rc == 0) {
01941                         rc = lnet_check_routes();
01942                         if (rc != 0)
01943                                 lnet_del_route(config->cfg_net,
01944                                                config->cfg_nid);
01945                 }
01946                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01947                 return rc;
01948 
01949         case IOC_LIBCFS_DEL_ROUTE:
01950                 config = arg;
01951 
01952                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*config))
01953                         return -EINVAL;
01954 
01955                 mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01956                 rc = lnet_del_route(config->cfg_net, config->cfg_nid);
01957                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
01958                 return rc;
01959 
01960         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_ROUTE:
01961                 config = arg;
01962 
01963                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*config))
01964                         return -EINVAL;
01965 
01966                 return lnet_get_route(config->cfg_count,
01967                                       &config->cfg_net,
01968                                       &config->cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_hop,
01969                                       &config->cfg_nid,
01970                                       &config->cfg_config_u.cfg_route.rtr_flags,
01971                                       &config->cfg_config_u.cfg_route.
01972                                         rtr_priority);
01973 
01974         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_NET: {
01975                 size_t total = sizeof(*config) +
01976                                sizeof(struct lnet_ioctl_net_config);
01977                 config = arg;
01978 
01979                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < total)
01980                         return -EINVAL;
01981 
01982                 return lnet_get_net_config(config);
01983         }
01984 
01985         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_LNET_STATS:
01986         {
01987                 struct lnet_ioctl_lnet_stats *lnet_stats = arg;
01988 
01989                 if (lnet_stats->st_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*lnet_stats))
01990                         return -EINVAL;
01991 
01992                 lnet_counters_get(&lnet_stats->st_cntrs);
01993                 return 0;
01994         }
01995 
01996         case IOC_LIBCFS_CONFIG_RTR:
01997                 config = arg;
01998 
01999                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*config))
02000                         return -EINVAL;
02001 
02002                 mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
02003                 if (config->cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.buf_enable) {
02004                         rc = lnet_rtrpools_enable();
02005                         mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
02006                         return rc;
02007                 }
02008                 lnet_rtrpools_disable();
02009                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
02010                 return 0;
02011 
02012         case IOC_LIBCFS_ADD_BUF:
02013                 config = arg;
02014 
02015                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*config))
02016                         return -EINVAL;
02017 
02018                 mutex_lock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
02019                 rc = lnet_rtrpools_adjust(config->cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.
02020                                                 buf_tiny,
02021                                           config->cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.
02022                                                 buf_small,
02023                                           config->cfg_config_u.cfg_buffers.
02024                                                 buf_large);
02025                 mutex_unlock(&the_lnet.ln_api_mutex);
02026                 return rc;
02027 
02028         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_BUF: {
02029                 struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg *pool_cfg;
02030                 size_t total = sizeof(*config) + sizeof(*pool_cfg);
02031 
02032                 config = arg;
02033 
02034                 if (config->cfg_hdr.ioc_len < total)
02035                         return -EINVAL;
02036 
02037                 pool_cfg = (struct lnet_ioctl_pool_cfg *)config->cfg_bulk;
02038                 return lnet_get_rtr_pool_cfg(config->cfg_count, pool_cfg);
02039         }
02040 
02041         case IOC_LIBCFS_GET_PEER_INFO: {
02042                 struct lnet_ioctl_peer *peer_info = arg;
02043 
02044                 if (peer_info->pr_hdr.ioc_len < sizeof(*peer_info))
02045                         return -EINVAL;
02046 
02047                 return lnet_get_peer_info(
02048                    peer_info->pr_count,
02049                    &peer_info->pr_nid,
02050                    peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_aliveness,
02051                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_ncpt,
02052                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_refcount,
02053                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_ni_peer_tx_credits,
02054                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_peer_tx_credits,
02055                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_peer_rtr_credits,
02056                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_peer_min_rtr_credits,
02057                    &peer_info->pr_lnd_u.pr_peer_credits.cr_peer_tx_qnob);
02058         }
02059 
02060         case IOC_LIBCFS_NOTIFY_ROUTER:
02061                 return lnet_notify(NULL, data->ioc_nid, data->ioc_flags,
02062                                    cfs_time_current() -
02063                                    cfs_time_seconds(cfs_time_current_sec() -
02064                                                     (time_t)data->ioc_u64[0]));
02065 
02066         case IOC_LIBCFS_LNET_DIST:
02067                 rc = LNetDist(data->ioc_nid, &data->ioc_nid, &data->ioc_u32[1]);
02068                 if (rc < 0 && rc != -EHOSTUNREACH)
02069                         return rc;
02070 
02071                 data->ioc_u32[0] = rc;
02072                 return 0;
02073 
02074         case IOC_LIBCFS_TESTPROTOCOMPAT:
02075                 lnet_net_lock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
02076                 the_lnet.ln_testprotocompat = data->ioc_flags;
02077                 lnet_net_unlock(LNET_LOCK_EX);
02078                 return 0;
02079 
02080         case IOC_LIBCFS_LNET_FAULT:
02081                 return lnet_fault_ctl(data->ioc_flags, data);
02082 
02083         case IOC_LIBCFS_PING:
02084                 id.nid = data->ioc_nid;
02085                 id.pid = data->ioc_u32[0];
02086                 rc = lnet_ping(id, data->ioc_u32[1], /* timeout */
02087                                (lnet_process_id_t __user *)data->ioc_pbuf1,
02088                                data->ioc_plen1/sizeof(lnet_process_id_t));
02089                 if (rc < 0)
02090                         return rc;
02091                 data->ioc_count = rc;
02092                 return 0;
02093 
02094         default:
02095                 ni = lnet_net2ni(data->ioc_net);
02096                 if (ni == NULL)
02097                         return -EINVAL;
02098 
02099                 if (ni->ni_lnd->lnd_ctl == NULL)
02100                         rc = -EINVAL;
02101                 else
02102                         rc = ni->ni_lnd->lnd_ctl(ni, cmd, arg);
02103 
02104                 lnet_ni_decref(ni);
02105                 return rc;
02106         }
02107         /* not reached */
02108 }
02109 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetCtl);
02110 
02111 void LNetDebugPeer(lnet_process_id_t id)
02112 {
02113         lnet_debug_peer(id.nid);
02114 }
02115 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetDebugPeer);
02116 
02128 int
02129 LNetGetId(unsigned int index, lnet_process_id_t *id)
02130 {
02131         struct lnet_ni   *ni;
02132         struct list_head *tmp;
02133         int               cpt;
02134         int               rc = -ENOENT;
02135 
02136         LASSERT(the_lnet.ln_refcount > 0);
02137 
02138         cpt = lnet_net_lock_current();
02139 
02140         list_for_each(tmp, &the_lnet.ln_nis) {
02141                 if (index-- != 0)
02142                         continue;
02143 
02144                 ni = list_entry(tmp, lnet_ni_t, ni_list);
02145 
02146                 id->nid = ni->ni_nid;
02147                 id->pid = the_lnet.ln_pid;
02148                 rc = 0;
02149                 break;
02150         }
02151 
02152         lnet_net_unlock(cpt);
02153         return rc;
02154 }
02155 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetGetId);
02156 
02161 void
02162 LNetSnprintHandle(char *str, int len, lnet_handle_any_t h)
02163 {
02164         snprintf(str, len, LPX64, h.cookie);
02165 }
02166 EXPORT_SYMBOL(LNetSnprintHandle);
02167 
02168 static int
02169 lnet_ping(lnet_process_id_t id, int timeout_ms, lnet_process_id_t __user *ids,
02170           int n_ids)
02171 {
02172         lnet_handle_eq_t     eqh;
02173         lnet_handle_md_t     mdh;
02174         lnet_event_t         event;
02175         lnet_md_t            md = { NULL };
02176         int                  which;
02177         int                  unlinked = 0;
02178         int                  replied = 0;
02179         const int            a_long_time = 60000; /* mS */
02180         int                  infosz;
02181         lnet_ping_info_t    *info;
02182         lnet_process_id_t    tmpid;
02183         int                  i;
02184         int                  nob;
02185         int                  rc;
02186         int                  rc2;
02187         sigset_t         blocked;
02188 
02189         infosz = offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[n_ids]);
02190 
02191         if (n_ids <= 0 ||
02192             id.nid == LNET_NID_ANY ||
02193             timeout_ms > 500000 ||              /* arbitrary limit! */
02194             n_ids > 20)                         /* arbitrary limit! */
02195                 return -EINVAL;
02196 
02197         if (id.pid == LNET_PID_ANY)
02198                 id.pid = LNET_PID_LUSTRE;
02199 
02200         LIBCFS_ALLOC(info, infosz);
02201         if (info == NULL)
02202                 return -ENOMEM;
02203 
02204         /* NB 2 events max (including any unlink event) */
02205         rc = LNetEQAlloc(2, LNET_EQ_HANDLER_NONE, &eqh);
02206         if (rc != 0) {
02207                 CERROR("Can't allocate EQ: %d\n", rc);
02208                 goto out_0;
02209         }
02210 
02211         /* initialize md content */
02212         md.start     = info;
02213         md.length    = infosz;
02214         md.threshold = 2; /*GET/REPLY*/
02215         md.max_size  = 0;
02216         md.options   = LNET_MD_TRUNCATE;
02217         md.user_ptr  = NULL;
02218         md.eq_handle = eqh;
02219 
02220         rc = LNetMDBind(md, LNET_UNLINK, &mdh);
02221         if (rc != 0) {
02222                 CERROR("Can't bind MD: %d\n", rc);
02223                 goto out_1;
02224         }
02225 
02226         rc = LNetGet(LNET_NID_ANY, mdh, id,
02227                      LNET_RESERVED_PORTAL,
02228                      LNET_PROTO_PING_MATCHBITS, 0);
02229 
02230         if (rc != 0) {
02231                 /* Don't CERROR; this could be deliberate! */
02232 
02233                 rc2 = LNetMDUnlink(mdh);
02234                 LASSERT(rc2 == 0);
02235 
02236                 /* NB must wait for the UNLINK event below... */
02237                 unlinked = 1;
02238                 timeout_ms = a_long_time;
02239         }
02240 
02241         do {
02242                 /* MUST block for unlink to complete */
02243                 if (unlinked)
02244                         blocked = cfs_block_allsigs();
02245 
02246                 rc2 = LNetEQPoll(&eqh, 1, timeout_ms, &event, &which);
02247 
02248                 if (unlinked)
02249                         cfs_restore_sigs(blocked);
02250 
02251                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "poll %d(%d %d)%s\n", rc2,
02252                        (rc2 <= 0) ? -1 : event.type,
02253                        (rc2 <= 0) ? -1 : event.status,
02254                        (rc2 > 0 && event.unlinked) ? " unlinked" : "");
02255 
02256                 LASSERT(rc2 != -EOVERFLOW);     /* can't miss anything */
02257 
02258                 if (rc2 <= 0 || event.status != 0) {
02259                         /* timeout or error */
02260                         if (!replied && rc == 0)
02261                                 rc = (rc2 < 0) ? rc2 :
02262                                      (rc2 == 0) ? -ETIMEDOUT :
02263                                      event.status;
02264 
02265                         if (!unlinked) {
02266                                 /* Ensure completion in finite time... */
02267                                 LNetMDUnlink(mdh);
02268                                 /* No assertion (racing with network) */
02269                                 unlinked = 1;
02270                                 timeout_ms = a_long_time;
02271                         } else if (rc2 == 0) {
02272                                 /* timed out waiting for unlink */
02273                                 CWARN("ping %s: late network completion\n",
02274                                       libcfs_id2str(id));
02275                         }
02276                 } else if (event.type == LNET_EVENT_REPLY) {
02277                         replied = 1;
02278                         rc = event.mlength;
02279                 }
02280 
02281         } while (rc2 <= 0 || !event.unlinked);
02282 
02283         if (!replied) {
02284                 if (rc >= 0)
02285                         CWARN("%s: Unexpected rc >= 0 but no reply!\n",
02286                               libcfs_id2str(id));
02287                 rc = -EIO;
02288                 goto out_1;
02289         }
02290 
02291         nob = rc;
02292         LASSERT(nob >= 0 && nob <= infosz);
02293 
02294         rc = -EPROTO;                           /* if I can't parse... */
02295 
02296         if (nob < 8) {
02297                 /* can't check magic/version */
02298                 CERROR("%s: ping info too short %d\n",
02299                        libcfs_id2str(id), nob);
02300                 goto out_1;
02301         }
02302 
02303         if (info->pi_magic == __swab32(LNET_PROTO_PING_MAGIC)) {
02304                 lnet_swap_pinginfo(info);
02305         } else if (info->pi_magic != LNET_PROTO_PING_MAGIC) {
02306                 CERROR("%s: Unexpected magic %08x\n",
02307                        libcfs_id2str(id), info->pi_magic);
02308                 goto out_1;
02309         }
02310 
02311         if ((info->pi_features & LNET_PING_FEAT_NI_STATUS) == 0) {
02312                 CERROR("%s: ping w/o NI status: 0x%x\n",
02313                        libcfs_id2str(id), info->pi_features);
02314                 goto out_1;
02315         }
02316 
02317         if (nob < offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[0])) {
02318                 CERROR("%s: Short reply %d(%d min)\n", libcfs_id2str(id),
02319                        nob, (int)offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[0]));
02320                 goto out_1;
02321         }
02322 
02323         if (info->pi_nnis < n_ids)
02324                 n_ids = info->pi_nnis;
02325 
02326         if (nob < offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[n_ids])) {
02327                 CERROR("%s: Short reply %d(%d expected)\n", libcfs_id2str(id),
02328                        nob, (int)offsetof(lnet_ping_info_t, pi_ni[n_ids]));
02329                 goto out_1;
02330         }
02331 
02332         rc = -EFAULT;                           /* If I SEGV... */
02333 
02334         memset(&tmpid, 0, sizeof(tmpid));
02335         for (i = 0; i < n_ids; i++) {
02336                 tmpid.pid = info->pi_pid;
02337                 tmpid.nid = info->pi_ni[i].ns_nid;
02338                 if (copy_to_user(&ids[i], &tmpid, sizeof(tmpid)))
02339                         goto out_1;
02340         }
02341         rc = info->pi_nnis;
02342 
02343  out_1:
02344         rc2 = LNetEQFree(eqh);
02345         if (rc2 != 0)
02346                 CERROR("rc2 %d\n", rc2);
02347         LASSERT(rc2 == 0);
02348 
02349  out_0:
02350         LIBCFS_FREE(info, infosz);
02351         return rc;
02352 }
